channel.title: Portfolios on Personal Digital Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Personal Digital Garden

item.title: 7. Metatags
item.description: Metatags are used to provide additional information about the page, usualy used by search engines and social media websites / apps. It allows to customize your page’s title, description, preview image and more. Configure default tags // config.toml title = "Personal Digital Garden" [Params] description = "My Digital Garden on the Internet" images = ['/digital-garden-logo.png'] Setting the above values will be used as default for all pages unless its overridden in a specific page’s markdown.
